Basic Information.name: Unique ID
Basic Information.help: Global unique ID of this object.

Basic Information.name: Unique Name
Basic Information.help: Global unique Name of this object.

Basic Information.name: Owner ID
Basic Information.help: ID of user who creates this object.

Basic Information.name: Owner Group ID
Basic Information.help: ID of group of user who creates this object.

Basic Information.name: Original Object ID
Basic Information.help: ID of source object of this object, if this object is a copy of an existing object.

Basic Information.name: Child Object IDs
Basic Information.help: ID of all child objects, if this object is a container object.

Basic Information.name: ID
Basic Information.help: Please enter a unique identifier used in your lab.

Basic Information.name: Description
Basic Information.help: Please enter detailes about this vector.

Basic Information.name: Vector-Map with Key Elements
Basic Information.help: Please enter a link to the vector map or attach a file (pdf, gb) which includes the vector-map with all key elements.

Basic Information.name: Vector Size
Basic Information.help: Please enter the size of the vector in base pairs and of the tag (if present), Example: pcDNA3.1: 5423 bp mTFP1: 711 bp

Expression and Amplification.name: Expression System
Expression and Amplification.help: Please enter information about the expression system you used.

Expression and Amplification.name: Bacterial Strain
Expression and Amplification.help: Please enter the bacterial  strain used for transformation, Example: E. coli HB101

Expression and Amplification.name: High or Low Copy
Expression and Amplification.help: Please choose the amplification level of the vector.

Expression and Amplification.name: Bacterial Resistance
Expression and Amplification.help: Please enter the bacterial resistances which can be used to select the transformed bacteria.

Expression and Amplification.name: Growth Conditions
Expression and Amplification.help: Please enter the growth conditions of the transformed bacteria or include the link to the SOP. Example: [Link to medium], incubation overnight at 37°C

Expression and Amplification.name: Stable Cell Selection
Expression and Amplification.help: Please enter the eukaryotic cell resistance which can be used to select transfected cells.

Information about the Origin.name: Reference PubMed ID
Information about the Origin.help: Please enter the PubMed ID of the paper.

Information about the Origin.name: Reference Paper
Information about the Origin.help: Please enter the citation of the paper where the vector was described.

Information about the Origin.name: Reference DOI
Information about the Origin.help: Please enter the digital object identifier (doi) of the paper.

Information about the Origin.name: Origin
Information about the Origin.help: Please enter the name of the creator of the vector and/or a link to the webpage.

Information about the Origin.name: Origin ID
Information about the Origin.help: Please enter the original name or ID of the vector assigned by its creator.

Information about the Origin.name: Distributor
Information about the Origin.help: Please enter the name of the principal investigator / distributor, from whom the vector was obtained.

Information about the Origin.name: Distributor Product ID
Information about the Origin.help: Please enter the original name or ID of the vector used in the lab from whom the plasmid was received.

Information about the Origin.name: Date of Receive
Information about the Origin.help: Please enter the date, when the plasmid was received.

Information about the Origin.name: Verification
Information about the Origin.help: Please indicate if the sequence of the vector has been verified.

Information about the Origin.name: Verification Link
Information about the Origin.help: Please enter a link or attach a file with the original sequence data and the analysis of sequencing.

Information about the Origin.name: Concentration of the Vector
Information about the Origin.help: Please enter the concentration of the vector and the method used to determine the concentration.

Information about the Origin.name: Storage
Information about the Origin.help: Please enter the site where the original plasmid is stored, Example: Room 105, -80°C freezer, Rack A3, Box5, Slot 20

Additional Information.name: Contact Person
Additional Information.help: Please enter the names and departments of the contact persons or principal investigators who are responsible for this entry and should be contacted for further questions.

Additional Information.name: Protected Sequences / MTAs
Additional Information.help: Please enter information about license agreements which have to be complied with or upload files with material transfer documents.

Additional Information.name: Aliquots Sent To
Additional Information.help: Please enter when and to whom aliquots have been sent.

Additional Information.name: Notes
Additional Information.help: Please enter and link all further information which is important to the vector.
